title: Sound On: Iranians in Russia, Bannon Goes To Prison
itunes:title: Sound On: Iranians in Russia, Bannon Goes To Prison
description:
Joe spoke with Former US Ambassador to Ukraine William Taylor about Iranians in Ukraine helping Russia use drones against Ukraine, Bloomberg politics reporter Mike Dorning on Donald Trump officially being subpoenaed to testify before the Jan. 6th committee and Steve Bannon's four month prison sentence for defying a subpoena from the House Jan. 6 committee. Plus our panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Rick Davis on Iranian with boots on the ground in Ukraine, US budget deficit drop, President Biden's prediction that Democrats will hold on to Congress in the midterms, and do voters care about President Biden's student loan forgiveness plan?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
